info.name: Pushkininstitute Black
info.description: Literally just blackening out Pushkininstitute's website. I didn't really care for the main page, only for the exercise pages, those, to my understanding, work. I've used the green as the accent colour, change it if you want.
info.additionalInfo: honestly idgaf I'll probably be the only person using this theme. y'all should fix the player colours, progress bars are not working properly.
